description: Choose from our selection of banquet stacking chairs ideal for function rooms, restaurants, hotels and conference centres. Our range combines durability and practicality with appealing designs and fabrics to complement any location. Our contract stacking chairs are manufactured to high standards and are ideal for frequent use. All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: Banqueting Chairs
